tasks.title: Add file locking for concurrent writes
tasks.notes:
The shared single file is a concurrency hot spot; concurrent writes can clobber each other if two agents update at the same time. SQLite in Docker helps, but CLI still uses JSON.

Solved via git-native approach - each repo has own .flux/data.json synced via flux-data branch

tasks.title: Refactor server as optional multi-repo aggregator
tasks.notes: Server becomes optional. Watches multiple repos' flux-data branches. SQLite is cache, not source of truth. CLI remains standalone.
